name: UNSTAYABLE
description:
game made for the Ludum Dare 49 game jam

You delve into an abandoned house to solve a murder mystery. You are equipped with a radar that can detect supernatural activities, Be careful though - the connection in the area is rather unstable...

//Objective

-hide in closets to survive

-activate light switch when it goes down

-collect all notes

-find the key and escape

//Controls

-move with the arrow keys

-interact with the mouse

-ESC to pause

-control menus with the arrow keys

-ENTER to proceed

//Disclaimer

Game contains jumpscares, If horror games aren't your cup of tea there is an option to disable them so you can still give it a shot (;.
